column4: and artistic. Very good prices as well. While you wait
column5: they have self serve coffee - it was Sunday at 11am
column6: and we only waited 20 minutes...We were a party of 2
column7: allowed to sit in a booth even though there was a wait. It was my mom's birthday
column8: and we were both very happy. Great fresh coffee - they keep a full carafe that you can use to refill on your own
